overview: The journalist Don Davis becomes involved in a murder case, where Chrystal Malone is part of it. Davis follows Chrystal to China. When Chrystal arrives in China, Davis has to save her from an execution.
tagline: That front page picture story here at last! Bill Haines as the cub reporter who "scoops" the world. A film of love and action hot off the press.
title: Telling the World
